Content:
My question is when changing exhaust to upgrade on the Nmax to Arkopovik or there's probably a million of them certainly it will be louder but will it increase hp much? Maybe 1 or 2 hp?

The other thing is does there need to be any retuning because of the exhaust change?

I know your thinking why bother on such a small bike.
This is in Thailand BTW

Thanks for any input!
